name: Pixlr
description: Pixlr is an AI-powered online photo editing and design platform for creating stunning visuals.
longDescription: Pixlr is a versatile online photo editing and graphic design tool that empowers users to create professional-quality visuals directly in their browser, on desktop, or via mobile apps. It offers two main editors: Pixlr X for beginners seeking quick, automated edits and Pixlr E for advanced users needing Photoshop-like control. With AI-driven features, Pixlr simplifies complex tasks like background removal and image generation, catering to both casual creators and professional designers. Its mission is to make high-quality design accessible to everyone, regardless of skill level or budget. The platform supports a wide range of file formats and provides access to millions of templates and assets, streamlining content creation for social media, marketing, and personal projects. Pixlrâ€™s cloud-based approach ensures flexibility and collaboration, making it ideal for users on the go.
features: AI-powered background removal instantly isolates subjects for clean, professional visuals.
Pixlr X offers intuitive, automated editing tools for quick enhancements suitable for beginners.
Pixlr E provides advanced layer-based editing, resembling Photoshop for precise design control.
Over 10 million pre-designed templates accelerate creation of social media posts, brochures, and more.
The AI image generator creates custom visuals from text prompts, sparking creative ideas.
Cross-platform compatibility allows seamless editing on web, desktop, and mobile devices.
Photo collage maker combines multiple images into engaging layouts with customizable templates.
Extensive stock library provides access to millions of free and premium assets like fonts and graphics.

faqs.question: Is Pixlr free to use?
faqs.answer: Yes, Pixlr offers a free plan with access to basic editing tools, limited to 3 daily saves and 50 AI credits, but includes ads.

faqs.question: What is the difference between Pixlr X and Pixlr E?
faqs.answer: Pixlr X is designed for beginners with simple, AI-driven editing tools, while Pixlr E offers advanced features like layers and brushes for professional editing.

faqs.question: Can I use Pixlr without downloading software?
faqs.answer: Yes, Pixlr is primarily web-based, allowing you to edit photos and create designs directly in your browser without installation.

faqs.question: Does Pixlr support Photoshop files?
faqs.answer: Pixlr supports basic PSD files, but complex Photoshop projects may not fully preserve their design when imported.

faqs.question: What are AI credits used for in Pixlr?
faqs.answer: AI credits are used for advanced features like background removal, image generation, and face swapping, with more credits included in paid plans.

faqs.question: Can I cancel my Pixlr subscription anytime?
faqs.answer: Yes, you can cancel your subscription through your account settings and retain premium access until the end of your billing cycle.

faqs.question: Is Pixlr suitable for team collaboration?
faqs.answer: The Team plan allows up to 5 users to collaborate, with shared access to premium features and 1,000 AI credits per user monthly.

faqs.question: Does Pixlr offer templates for social media?
faqs.answer: Yes, Pixlr provides thousands of customizable templates optimized for social media platforms like Instagram, Facebook, and Twitter.
